texts: Your Blue Badge discount is due to expire.
If you are still eligible for a Blue Badge you can renew the discount.
You need to upload images of both sides of your new Blue Badge and proof of identification.
You need to provide a copy of:
Plus a copy of 1 of the following proofs of identity:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["DSS benefit entitlement letter (no more than 7 months old)","Current passport","Current driverâ€™s licence","Pension book/entitlement letter (no more than 7 months old)","Birth certificate (same first and last names as the Blue Badge. Not a Certificate of Registration of Birth)","Marriage certificate (same first and last names as the Blue Badge)","Current bank or credit card statement (no more than 3 months old)","Deed Poll Certificate (same first and last names as the Blue Badge)"]}
